code:
import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{createStore,compose,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';// localStorage
import{productsReducer}from"./products/reducer";import{searchReducer}from"./search/reducer";// ...
var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;// создаем объект конфигурации для persist
var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage};// комбинируем редьюсеры
var rootReducer=combineReducers({products:productsReducer,search:searchReducer});// оборачиваем редьюсеры в persist
var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);// создаем store с использованием persistedReducer
export var store=createStore(persistedReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));// создаем persistor
export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
